issue.title: Pricing: there's no way to delete a pricing profile
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In the pricing management of an organism, there is no way to delete a pricing profile.
We forgot about it in the mockups (#643).
We should add a delete (Red Button with X) at the end of the line, in the profiles list.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

This one has been merged (2015-05-21 rev 8652).
To close
